# usdz

**Type Property**

A type that represents Universal Scene Description Package content.

## Declaration

```swift
static var usdz: UTType { get }
```

## Discussion

The identifier for this type is `com.pixar.universal-scene-description-mobile`.

This type conforms to [doc://com.apple.uniformtypeidentifiers/documentation/UniformTypeIdentifiers/UTType3DContent] and [doc://com.apple.uniformtypeidentifiers/documentation/UniformTypeIdentifiers/UTTypeData].

## 3D content

- **threeDContent**: A base type that represents 3D content.
- **usd**: A type that represents Universal Scene Description content.
